messages.title: Priorities for Jericho and Osney Ward
messages.content: INVESTMENT not cuts in the NHS, ACTION not talk on climate change and the environment, SUPPORT for local schools, nurseries and Sure Start children's centres, REDUCE the flooding risk in West Oxford, WORK for a new community centre for Jericho, SUSTAINABLE transport, making walking and cycling safer and more pleasant, QUALITY services and rights for all, including those with disabilities, IMPROVING not closing our children's play areas

messages.title: Standing Up for Our Community
messages.content: We believe in public investment, economic action and fairness so everyone has the chance of a good life and sustainable environment, with High quality public services. We're proud of Oxford and want the best for everyone. We achieve more by working together than we can achieve alone. Keep Richard and Susanna working for you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocates for investment not cuts in the NHS.
Calls for action not talk on climate change and the environment.
Support for local schools, nurseries, and Sure Start children's centres.
Aims to reduce flooding risk in West Oxford.
Work for a new community centre for Jericho.
Promotes sustainable transport to make walking and cycling safer and more pleasant.
Ensures quality services and rights for all, including those with disabilities.
Opposes closing children's play areas, advocating for their improvement.

issues.health: Advocates for investment not cuts in the NHS.

housing.content: REDUCE the flooding risk in West Oxford.

leaflet.personalStatement: Susanna has lived in Oxford for 40 years, working as a teacher for most of that time. She has represented the ward since 1996 and was Lord Mayor of Oxford last year.

politicalExperience.achievements: Was Lord Mayor of Oxford last year.

politicalExperience.role: Oxfordshire County Councillor and Primary School Governor
politicalExperience.achievements: Richard campaigns on key issues like climate change and has a particular interest in support for children and adults with learning disabilities.

images.caption: Susanna and Richard work together with you all year round on your local community things done for local residents.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Richard and Susanna - working together in Jericho and Osney Ward.
